steps.name: User open editor on mobile screen has width 900
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Click on the row 1 in the data table in mobile screen
Verify 'Editor is unavailable on mobile' modal is shown
Verify text Editor is unavailable on mobile of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name:
==> The Text is: Editor is unavailable on mobile
The device you’re using is too small to create and edit PageFly pages or sections.
Please use a laptop or desktop to complete this action.
Close
